// Pivot -1, -1
int pinball_level[16] = {
	393, 67,
	395, 64,
	398, 64,
	400, 67,
	400, 87,
	399, 90,
	395, 90,
	393, 88
};

// Pivot -0.001603, -0.001880
float pinball_level[16] = {
	0.629808f, 0.125940f,
	0.633013f, 0.120301f,
	0.637821f, 0.120301f,
